SEARCH
Package com.sheryians.major.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.sheryians.major.controller.AdminController
@Controller public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class handles all admin-related HTTP requests. It provides endpoints for managing categories and products.

  • Method Details

    • adminHome

      @GetMapping("/admin") public String adminHome()
      Handles the GET request for the admin home page.
      Returns:
      the name of the admin home view

    • getCat

      @GetMapping("/admin/categories") public String getCat(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request for the categories page as well. It Adds the list of all categories to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - This model to which the categories are added
      Returns:
      This name of the categories view

    • getCatAdd

      @GetMapping("/admin/categories/add") public String getCatAdd(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request for the add category page. Adds a new Category object to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which the new category is added
      Returns:
      the name of the add category view

    • postCatAdd

      @PostMapping("/admin/categories/add") public String postCatAdd(@ModelAttribute("category") com.sheryians.major.model.Category category)
      Handles the POST request to add a new category.
      Parameters:
      category - the category to be added
      Returns:
      a redirect to the categories page

    • deleteCat

      @GetMapping("/admin/categories/delete/{id}") public String deleteCat(@PathVariable int id)
      Handles the GET request to delete a category by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the category to be deleted
      Returns:
      a redirect to the categories page

    • updateCat

      @GetMapping("/admin/categories/update/{id}") public String updateCat(@PathVariable int id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request to update a category by its ID. Adds the category to the model if found, otherwise returns an error view.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the category to be updated
      model - the model to which the category is added
      Returns:
      the name of the update category view or an error view if the category is not found

    • products

      @GetMapping("/admin/products") public String products(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request for the products page. Adds the list of all products to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which the products are added
      Returns:
      the name of the products view

    • productAddGet

      @GetMapping("/admin/products/add") public String productAddGet(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the GET request for the add product page. Adds a new ProductDTO object and the list of all categories to the model.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to which the new product and categories are added
      Returns:
      the name of the add product view

    • productAddPost

      @PostMapping("/admin/products/add") public String productAddPost(@ModelAttribute("productDTO") com.sheryians.major.dto.ProductDTO productDTO, @RequestParam("productImage") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile file, @RequestParam("imgName") String imgName) throws IOException
      Handles the product addition form submission from the admin panel. The method converts a productDTO object into a product object and then adds it to the product database.
      Parameters:
      productDTO - A ProductDTO object containing the submitted product details.
      file - The uploaded product image file (MultipartFile).
      imgName - A fallback image name if no file is uploaded.
      Returns:
      A string redirecting to the admin product list page ("redirect:/admin/products").
      Throws:
      IOException - If there's an error while writing the uploaded image file.

    • deleteProduct

      @GetMapping("/admin/product/delete/{id}") public String deleteProduct(@PathVariable long id)
      Handles the product deletion request from the admin panel.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to be deleted (PathVariable).
      Returns:
      A string redirecting to the admin product list page ("redirect:/admin/products").

    • updateProductGet

      @GetMapping("/admin/product/update/{id}") public String updateProductGet(@PathVariable long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the product deletion request from the admin panel.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the product to be deleted (PathVariable).
      Returns:
      A string redirecting to the admin product list page ("redirect:/admin/products").
